name: Bynder image library
tag_list: image-bank, digital-asset-management, document-management-system, share, collect, storage, secure, file-share, file-sharing, file-storage, file-collect, file-collecting, online-share, online-file-storage, structure, sharing, collecting, structured, safe
overview:
Bynder is a media-hub to fuel your apps, sites and suppliers.
Collect, manage & share marketing material. Online, easy and secure.

It supports multiple file types for images, pdf files, processor files, photo editing software files and more.

With Bynder your company gets its own customizable customer Bynder site: http://companyname.getbynder.com.

The look and feel of a company’s Bynder site can be adjusted, making it a part of the company.

Spread your marketing files throughout your company but especially outside. Via multiple channels. Through temporary links or through a public website. All at your convenience.

Make your files smarter and you’ll find them quicker. In Bynder this happens without noticing. By combining different filter and tags you’ll be able to find, preview and pick the right images a lot easier and faster. Search for files by color, tags, file type, title, or partial words.

Bynder acts as a hub for all your websites, systems and corporate apps. Re-use media and get your corporate image out there on iPads or other devices. Use the same images thoughout your systems.
